title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Case-Based Microlearning for Understanding Inter-Organizational Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: By analyzing actual project cases, learners can explain the eight core lessons of interorganizational learning
Based on case study results, learners can categorize learning into three areas: organizational capacity, organizational internalization, and collective awareness
Applying knowledge acquired in mobile learning environments, learners can propose solutions to problems in virtual scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
